Text.valUnicode: Format csv File: Type, Account No(12), Description(100),Calc (+/-), Note(20)

ExpSyntax.val: StrBuild(MlsTrans('Error uploading file @1@ with status code @2@'), IF(ISNULL({0,2}), 'NULL',Trim({0,2})), Str({0,3}, '1'))
Trim({0,2})<>'' AND NOT ISNULL({0,7}) OR Trim({0,2})=''
MlsTrans('This Record have Detail, can not cancelled')
MlsTrans('Account type is not for Income Statement')
MlsTrans('Enter Line No with type Detail/Accumulation')

Text.valUnicode: Format csv File: Type, Account No(12), Description(100),Calc (+/-), Note(20)

ExpSyntax.val: StrBuild(MlsTrans('Error uploading file @1@ with status code @2@'), IF(ISNULL({0,2}), 'NULL',Trim({0,2})), Str({0,3}, '1'))
Trim({0,2})<>'' AND NOT ISNULL({0,7}) OR Trim({0,2})='' OR InStr('AP',Trim({0,1}))>0
MlsTrans('This Record have Detail, can not cancelled')
MlsTrans('Account type is not as Activa')
MlsTrans('Account Type is not as Pasiva')
MlsTrans('Enter From Line No Type to Detail/Accumulation only')
